mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAVORITE(FAVORITE_NO, MEMBER_NO, PRODUCT_NO) VALUES(SEQ_FAVORITE.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{productNo})
mapper.select: SELECT F.FAVORITE_NO , S.SELLER_NO , S.NAME SELLER_NAME , P.PRODUCT_NO , P.NAME PRODUCT_NAME , P.PRICE , PI.FILENAME THUMBNAIL_FILENAME , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FAVORITE F2 WHERE F2.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO) FAVORITE_CNT FROM FAVORITE F JOIN PRODUCT P ON F.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO JOIN SELLER S ON P.SELLER_NO = S.SELLER_NO JOIN PRODUCT_IMG PI ON P.PRODUCT_NO = PI.PRODUCT_NO AND PI.THUMBNAIL_YN = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_NO = ${memberNo}
